recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: Tender beef filet wrapped in puff pastry with duxelles and prosciutto.

recipes.title: Falafel Wrap
recipes.description: Crispy falafel balls wrapped in a pita with hummus, tahini, and fresh vegetables.

recipes.title: French Onion Soup
recipes.description: A savory soup made with caramelized onions, beef broth, and topped with melted cheese.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir Fry
recipes.description: A mix of fresh vegetables stir-fried with soy sauce and served over rice.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.description: Tender chicken cooked in a rich, creamy tomato gravy.

recipes.title: Rogan Josh
recipes.description: A flavorful lamb curry with a blend of spices and a tomato-based sauce.

recipes.title: Tempura
recipes.description: Lightly battered and deep-fried seafood and vegetables.
